prompt: Create a minimal and elegant quiz results page with a clean white background and pastel tones. Display 'Great Job!' at the top. Show a soft circular progress indicator for 78% score. Add a clean card with subtle shadows showing score (16/20), time (6m 45s), and accuracy. Include three rounded buttons: 'Review' (soft blue), 'Restart' (light gray), and 'Share' (soft pink). Provide a simple breakdown with muted icons for correct (green), incorrect (red), and skipped (yellow). Use white space and minimalist design.
flutter_code:
import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

class GeneratedWidget extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      backgroundColor: Colors.white,
      appBar: AppBar(
        title: Text('Results', style: TextStyle(fontWeight: FontWeight.w300, fontSize: 20)),
        backgroundColor: Colors.white,
        foregroundColor: Colors.grey[800],
        elevation: 0,
        centerTitle: true,
      ),
      body: SingleChildScrollView(
        padding: EdgeInsets.all(24.0),
        child: Column(
          children: [
            SizedBox(height: 20),
            Text('Great Job!', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 24, fontWeight: FontWeight.w300, color: Colors.grey[800], letterSpacing: 1.2)),
            SizedBox(height: 40),
            Container(
              width: 120,
              height: 120,
              decoration: BoxDecoration(
                shape: BoxShape.circle,
                color: Colors.green[50],
                border: Border.all(color: Colors.green[200]!, width: 3),
              ),
              child: Center(
                child: Column(
                  mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center,
                  children: [
                    Text('78%', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 28, fontWeight: FontWeight.w300, color: Colors.green[600])),
                    Text('Score', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 12, color: Colors.grey[600], letterSpacing: 0.5)),
                  ],
                ),
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 40),
            Container(
              margin: EdgeInsets.symmetric(vertical: 16),
              padding: EdgeInsets.all(24),
              decoration: BoxDecoration(
                color: Colors.white,
                borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(20),
                boxShadow: [
                  BoxShadow(
                    color: Colors.grey[200]!,
                    blurRadius: 10,
                    spreadRadius: 0,
                    offset: Offset(0, 4),
                  ),
                ],
              ),
              child: Column(
                children: [
                  Row(
                    mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.spaceBetween,
                    children: [
                      Text('Total Score', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 14, color: Colors.grey[600], fontWeight: FontWeight.w400)),
                      Text('16/20', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 14, fontWeight: FontWeight.w500, color: Colors.grey[800])),
                    ],
                  ),
                  SizedBox(height: 16),
                  Row(
                    mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.spaceBetween,
                    children: [
                      Text('Time Taken', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 14, color: Colors.grey[600], fontWeight: FontWeight.w400)),
                      Text('6m 45s', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 14, fontWeight: FontWeight.w500, color: Colors.grey[800])),
                    ],
                  ),
                  SizedBox(height: 16),
                  Row(
                    mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.spaceBetween,
                    children: [
                      Text('Accuracy', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 14, color: Colors.grey[600], fontWeight: FontWeight.w400)),
                      Text('78%', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 14, fontWeight: FontWeight.w500, color: Colors.grey[800])),
                    ],
                  ),
                ],
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 32),
            Row(
              children: [
                Expanded(
                  child: Container(
                    height: 48,
                    child: ElevatedButton(
                      onPressed: () {},
                      style: ElevatedButton.styleFrom(
                        backgroundColor: Colors.blue[50],
                        foregroundColor: Colors.blue[600],
                        elevation: 0,
                        shape: RoundedRectangleBorder(borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(24)),
                      ),
                      child: Text('Review', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 14, fontWeight: FontWeight.w500)),
                    ),
                  ),
                ),
                SizedBox(width: 16),
                Expanded(
                  child: Container(
                    height: 48,
                    child: ElevatedButton(
                      onPressed: () {},
                      style: ElevatedButton.styleFrom(
                        backgroundColor: Colors.grey[100],
                        foregroundColor: Colors.grey[700],
                        elevation: 0,
                        shape: RoundedRectangleBorder(borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(24)),
                      ),
                      child: Text('Restart', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 14, fontWeight: FontWeight.w500)),
                    ),
                  ),
                ),
                SizedBox(width: 16),
                Expanded(
                  child: Container(
                    height: 48,
                    child: ElevatedButton(
                      onPressed: () {},
                      style: ElevatedButton.styleFrom(
                        backgroundColor: Colors.pink[50],
                        foregroundColor: Colors.pink[600],
                        elevation: 0,
                        shape: RoundedRectangleBorder(borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(24)),
                      ),
                      child: Text('Share', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 14, fontWeight: FontWeight.w500)),
                    ),
                  ),
                ),
              ],
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 40),
            Container(
              padding: EdgeInsets.all(24),
              decoration: BoxDecoration(
                color: Colors.white,
                borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(20),
                boxShadow: [
                  BoxShadow(
                    color: Colors.grey[200]!,
                    blurRadius: 10,
                    spreadRadius: 0,
                    offset: Offset(0, 4),
                  ),
                ],
              ),
              child: Column(
                crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.start,
                children: [
                  Text('Summary', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 16, fontWeight: FontWeight.w400, color: Colors.grey[800])),
                  SizedBox(height: 20),
                  Row(
                    children: [
                      Container(
                        width: 8,
                        height: 8,
                        decoration: BoxDecoration(shape: BoxShape.circle, color: Colors.green[300]),
                      ),
                      SizedBox(width: 12),
                      Text('Correct: 16', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 14, color: Colors.grey[700])),
                    ],
                  ),
                  SizedBox(height: 16),
                  Row(
                    children: [
                      Container(
                        width: 8,
                        height: 8,
                        decoration: BoxDecoration(shape: BoxShape.circle, color: Colors.red[300]),
                      ),
                      SizedBox(width: 12),
                      Text('Incorrect: 4', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 14, color: Colors.grey[700])),
                    ],
                  ),
                  SizedBox(height: 16),
                  Row(
                    children: [
                      Container(
                        width: 8,
                        height: 8,
                        decoration: BoxDecoration(shape: BoxShape.circle, color: Colors.orange[300]),
                      ),
                      SizedBox(width: 12),
                      Text('Skipped: 0', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 14, color: Colors.grey[700])),
                    ],
                  ),
                ],
              ),
            ),
          ],
        ),
      ),
    );
  }
}
